Conference posters

about

Text, Speech and Dialogue (TSD) is an international conference is concerned with the topics about research in the field of natural language processing.

I created a poster for 2014 and 2016 conference which were taking place in Brno, Czech republic. The posters were suited for various formats and media â€“ from email newsletters to a large roll-up.
